title: $1-bln Lego plant construction starts in Vietnam
dc:creator: Retail Asia
description:
read the original version on: www.retailnews.asia

Construction of a $1-billion Lego plant began Thursday in the southern province of Binh Duong. Covering 44 hectares in Vietnam-Singapore Industrial Park 3, the plant is scheduled to create some 4,000 jobs and launch its first products in 2024. This is the sixth plant of the Danish toy company worldwide, and its second in Asia. […]

The post $1-bln Lego plant construction starts in Vietnam appeared first on Retail News Asia.
